abstract.t: In the context of vehicular networks for Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), vehicles that comprise in-vehicle networks require to discover Mobile Network Prefixes (MNPs) of other vehicles in order to communicate with other vehicles or the roadside infrastructure on the same wireless link. This document proposes Mobile Network Prefix Provisioning (MNPP), a solution to advertise an MNP assigned to a vehicle to others in both a proactive or reactive fashion.
